description_for_human: Turn any web page into clean markdown. Smart web fetcher for AI agents with auto-escalation from HTTP to headless browser.
description_for_model: WebPeel fetches web pages and converts them to clean, AI-ready markdown. It uses smart escalation: tries fast HTTP first (~200ms), automatically escalates to a headless browser for JavaScript-heavy sites (~2s). Supports search via DuckDuckGo. Use webpeel_fetch to read web page content and webpeel_search to find relevant pages.
